description:
These 2N1 performance shorts combine a Light-Compression Fit liner underneath a Relaxed Fit shell. Enjoy a full range of motion and performance-level support.
All types of training – from weights to rowing, rock climbing to yoga. This versatile multi-sport short will have you posting PRs in no time. Lightweight, breathable, and moisture-wicking, sweat doesn’t stand a chance in this absolute unit of a short.
name: Saxx Underwear Gainmaker 2n1 Shorts, 9” Inseam - Mens
